title: David Borden  Complete Continuing Story Of Counterpoint & Cayuga
description:
David Borden forged his own unique take on minimalism using a very organic use of syntheizers, voice and guitars (played by his son) for "The Continuing Story Of Counterpoint".  Not as bombastic and stylized as Glass or as precious as Reich but every bit as curious and whimsical as father of minimalism Terry Riley.  Essential for fans of minimalist music.  

"Cayuga Nights" is inspired by the long winters where Borden lives near Lake Cayuga, NY.  Impressionistic ambient music at it&#039;s best.

Enjoy!
